channel.title: Code Summary :: Fusion CAC Documentation
channel.description: The Code Summary screen shows a summary of activity on the account and provides activity buttons to Claim Ownership, Show History, and Print Abstract (if a printer is configured). This pane also provides information on Current Owner, First Coder, Last Saver, and Last Submitter. You can expand the width of the Code Summary pane by clicking on the right-arrow in the top right of the pane.
